snippet: Monaco defender Benjamin Mendy has been suspended for five matches by Ligue 1's disciplinary committee after he was sent off in the 3-1 home defeat to Olympique Lyonnais on Sunday, his club said on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Monaco defender Benjamin Mendy has been suspended for five matches by Ligue 1's disciplinary committee after he was sent off in the 3-1 home defeat to Olympique Lyonnais on Sunday, his club said on Friday.

headline.main: AS Monaco Defender Mendy Banned for Five Matches
headline.print_headline: AS Monaco Defender Mendy Banned for Five Matches
